game.name: Audrey Pony Daycare
game.description:
Hey kids, it’s really awesome to spend time with the animals! There is a cute girl named Audrey, who has recently take up the charge of the daycare of a pony. The girl is intelligent, but confused how to perform her job in the countryside. She trusts on your talent, so please don’t do anything that could let her down. Come on girls! Come forward and help Audrey to clean, brush and feed the pony perfectly in this free online animal’s game.   

Apart from taking the responsibility of Pony’s daycare, you also help the twos pick up the perfect outfits in Audrey Pony Daycare. In this cool html5 game, you are sure to grab the unlimited fun within a short gameplay. Make sure that you apply your patience and creativity skills to earn a huge score in this brand new animal caring game for boys and girls. Your first job in this best animal’s game is to clean and feed the pony before dressing up the two.  

Your love for the animals will definitely help to bring a big smile to the face of pony. Both girl and pony will be grateful to you if the end result will meet with their expectations. There is no need to bother since nobody will come to scold you if the output doesn’t suit your expectations. You can play this extremely-designed animal game for girls again and again until the best result is created. Roll up your sleeves kids and show the world that you are a true animal lover!
